subject: Query regarding HTTPUnit
msgSnippet: Hi, I am presently writing a HTTPUnit test case for an application. I basically have a Login page to start off with the usage of the application. Now i have
messageBody:
Hi,
I am presently writing a HTTPUnit test case for an
application. I basically have a Login page to start
off with the usage of the application. Now i have
written a HTTPUnit test case to check the function of
the only submit button in the Login page. This works
fine. Now a new page called Article page is loaded
after the logging in prosess through the login page.
Now i try to test the UI componets of Article page in
the same test case that i have written to test the
Login page. But i am not able to achieve the purpose.
On clicking a link on the Article page, my test case
does not confirm the loading of the third page. Is it
not possible to check for the flow of an application
in a single HTTPUnit test case? Do we have to write
seperate HTTPUnit test cases for each UI page that we
have? Please clarify.
Thank you.
Regards,
Aiyanna.
